entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's sign is mentioned in the sky again.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are on the march three days after Harry's scar hurts.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as their Divination teacher at Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who remembers what Professor Trelawney said.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as reacting to Harry's mention of Voldemort's name.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having a terrified look and reacting to Harry's mention of Professor Trelawney.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters are associated with Voldemort.
